Vagabond Commands:.vagabond: Get a quote from the manga Vagabond
Vagabond Commands:.vdel: Delete a Vagabond quote (Quotes 1-5 cannot be deleted!)
Vagabond Commands:.vpanel: Get a panel from the manga Vagabond

Insight Commands:.insight: Get insight from a philosopher/notable figure
Insight Commands:.responding: Set the response state of the bot to 'true' or 'false'
